directions: Finely shred ginger into a bowl. Zest lemons and add zest to ginger. Mix sugar and juice from the lemons into ginger-lemon zest mixture.
Combine ice and mint leaves in a large jug or pitcher. Strain ginger mixture through a sieve directly into the jug; stir in sparkling water.
ingredients: 2 (6 inch) pieces fresh ginger root, peeled
3 sprigs fresh mint, leaves removed and stem discarded
title: Ginger Beer
